title: Position: Participatory Assessment of Large Language Model Applications in an Academic Medical Center
details: G Carra, B Kulynych, F Bastardot, DE Kaufmann… - GenAI for Health: Potential, Trust …
abstract: Although Large Language Models (LLMs) have shown promising performance in healthcare-related applications, their deployment in the medical domain poses unique challenges of ethical, regulatory, and technical nature. In this study, we …
